		- token.transfer(to,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Burner__1.sol#382)

	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Withdrawal(token,receiver,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Burner__1.sol#375)
